attributes.action: We do not need or want a second referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Press coverage and independent polls show that the leave vote still favour exiting the EU. The electorate supported David Cameron who advocated we held a ferendum, we had said referendum and then voted in the conservatives to take us through Brexit. Three votes favouring leave! We do not need to keep voting as this would undermine the democratic process.
attributes.background: The anti Brexit campaigners need to know that the leave voters are as committed as ever to leave the EU and will let it be known we do not need or want a second referendum.
